title: Clothes Detector
description: Preprocessor to detect the clothes worn by the people detected by the Object Detection preprocessor. The clothes detection preprocessor would only detect clothes worn by people.

clothes.description: Contains a list of clothes worn by people

personID.description: The ID of a person. The ID is generated by ca.mcgill.a11y.image.preprocessor.objectDetection and is reused in this preprocessor

attire.description: The articles of clothing detected as being worn by the specified person, each listed separately.

article.description: One of the clothing outfit worn by the individual

confidence.description: Confidence value for the detected article of clothing.
